Literature.Title: Conjugation of Cell-Penetrating Peptides to Antimicrobial Peptides Enhances Antibacterial Activity.
Literature.Author: Lee H, Lim SI, Shin SH, Lim Y, Koh JW, Yang S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=8-16µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=8µM),Enterococcus faecalis KCTC 2011(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=16-32µM),Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=16-32µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=32µM),Proteus vulgaris KCTC 2433(MIC=32µM)
